title: Refresh token reuse
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm seeing lots of errors in IdentityServer for token issued failure when this library is trying to re-use refresh tokens.

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/12090617/435c791b-e8f2-4799-bc83-7cd88a804a7d)




### Expected behavior

The library does not use a refresh token more than once.

### Actual behavior

The library does use refresh tokens more than once.

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
